$interpreted: Elegant Female Noble: It's our Kingdom's anniversary today! Oh, what an extravaganza~
Curly Haired Male Noble: The castle looks magnificent after renovations. What a pity Her Highness is ill. It's unlikely we'll get to see the bedridden princess...
Elegant Female Noble: Oh yes... I heard that His Majesty, King Theodore will make an important announcement.
Curly Haired Male Noble: Really!? I didn't know.
Elegant Female Noble: Ah, His Majesty is here.
Theodore: On this day two hundred years ago, our Kingdom arose from humble beginnings to become a shining empire.
Theodore: ...It's an honorable pleasure to have the presence of our Kingdom's most noble folk, to bear witness to this legendary moment together...

Nigel: The royal banquet has begun. I'm sure lots of
nobles are in the grand hallroom now.
Naya: Snatch back the crown. It's now or never.
Angelia: There are usually no guards patrolling the corridor further down. This way!
Soldier: Who are you?! Em... princess?
Nigel: Damn it all!
Angelia: STOP! We agreed to absolutely no bloodshed!
Nigel: You also said there were no guards.
Angelia: But... but I remember, that was how it used to be...
Naya: Special occasion... the Royal guards must have been assigned new patrol routes. We'll tie them up out of the way. No big deal.
Nigel: Wait, he's one of our own!
Naya: WHAT?! This is our mole?
Nigel: Where's Yamitsuki?
Charle: I've no idea, but she mentioned you'd assist in my plan with Aosta..
Angelia: You... are you the Rune Academy Headmaster Ceres?
Nigel: Ceres' team developed the Soul Energy extraction device for the Dragoneye Gem.
Nigel: An invitation for him is to be expected.
Charle: It's Princess Angelia... I know your quest in part. I will aid you.
Angelia: The Rune Academy never participates in national politics. Why...
Charle: I wish for the Dragoneye Gem to be returned to its rightful place, as does my compatriot.
Charle: The edges of our goals merely overlap. I've no intention of getting involved in political warfare.
Theodore: ... Kingdom of the Sun bears the responsibility of freeing Atlas from the control of monsters,
Theodore: so demihumans may return to their homeland. Thus, the Kingdom must complete two tasks.
Theodore: First, the castle must fly immediately for Atlas, and hold true to the Kingdom's promise.
Curly Haired Male Noble: The castle can fly!? Is it possible?
Theodore: Indeed it can! After years of tedious labour, the final preparations are now complete.
Theodore: Now, bear witness to this magnificent moment!
Charle: The engines are humming! No time to waste! I'll take you to the control room!
Charle: Aren't they coming along?
Nigel: We agreed to move separately.
Nigel: They are off to stop Theodore. If the King resists, I will stop the castle from flying anywhere.
Naya: Angel, you ready?
Angelia: In order to not spark a war, we must stop King Theodore!

Model.Text: It's our Kingdom's anniversary today! Oh, what an extravaganza~
The castle looks magnificent after renovations. What a pity Her Highness is ill. It's unlikely we'll get to see the bedridden princess...
Oh yes... I heard that His Majesty, King Theodore will make an important announcement.
Really!? I didn't know.
Ah, His Majesty is here.
On this day two hundred years ago, our Kingdom arose from humble beginnings to become a shining empire.
...It's an honorable pleasure to have the presence of our Kingdom's most noble folk, to bear witness to this legendary moment together...

The royal banquet has begun. I'm sure lots of
nobles are in the grand hallroom now.
Snatch back the crown. It's now or never.
There are usually no guards patrolling the corridor further down. This way!
Who are you?! Em... princess?
Damn it all!
STOP! We agreed to absolutely no bloodshed!
You also said there were no guards.
But... but I remember, that was how it used to be...
Special occasion... the Royal guards must have been assigned new patrol routes. We'll tie them up out of the way. No big deal.
Wait, he's one of our own!
WHAT?! This is our mole?
Where's Yamitsuki?
I've no idea, but she mentioned you'd assist in my plan with Aosta..
You... are you the Rune Academy Headmaster Ceres?
Ceres' team developed the Soul Energy extraction device for the Dragoneye Gem.
An invitation for him is to be expected.
It's Princess Angelia... I know your quest in part. I will aid you.
The Rune Academy never participates in national politics. Why...
I wish for the Dragoneye Gem to be returned to its rightful place, as does my compatriot.
The edges of our goals merely overlap. I've no intention of getting involved in political warfare.
... Kingdom of the Sun bears the responsibility of freeing Atlas from the control of monsters,
so demihumans may return to their homeland. Thus, the Kingdom must complete two tasks.
First, the castle must fly immediately for Atlas, and hold true to the Kingdom's promise.
The castle can fly!? Is it possible?
Indeed it can! After years of tedious labour, the final preparations are now complete.
Now, bear witness to this magnificent moment!
The engines are humming! No time to waste! I'll take you to the control room!
Aren't they coming along?
We agreed to move separately.
They are off to stop Theodore. If the King resists, I will stop the castle from flying anywhere.
Angel, you ready?
In order to not spark a war, we must stop King Theodore!
